div.p: Family background... If I were to sum it up in a word very confused, I was moved around a lot because my mum had
domestic violence from my dad. I didn’t really have much of a childhood in the sense of the luxury things of being a child
because my mum was a single parent and there was me and my sister... I am one of 9, my dad’s got, I’ve got family in Jamaica
I’ve got a brother in Jamaica, I’ve got a brother and sister in Bristol and I’ve got 2 sisters and a brother in another area in Gloucester
but I’ve only got one blood sister in a sense from my mum. My mum did work, she’s always had a mixture of jobs cleaning,
to being a care assistant for residential homes. I also remember my dad also coming to the house and my mum had to ring up my mum’s
boyfriend at the time saying my dad’s just turned up here and he’s kicking off and he wants to take the kids and things like that
so I remember all those things. And also for my sister as well, she tried covering up a lot of things to my mum about me because
I was the man of the house and I was never violent to my sister physically but I was always verbal and I said
if you tell mum I’m doing this or where I keep that watch what happens and things like that so I put a lot of heartache
into my sister as well. I also brought a lot of heartache to my mum in the sense of when I got into drugs the police kicking off the door,
once I got involved in an incident with drugs and I had to get a gun and stuff and armed police kicking off the door and things like that
and I remember those things that I know were bad and I’m always saying to my mum sorry, sorry and she says don’t say that
look at you now, you know what I mean she stuck by me, she stuck by me, she stuck by me going down the cells, going
to court, even paying off some of my debts with drug dealers when I got out of drug selling and became more of an addict...
